data.name: Movavi Video Suite 17 - Video Making Software - Video Editor, Video Converter, Screen Capture, and more
data.detailed_description:
Movavi Video Suite is the ultimate set of multimedia apps designed to make working with video, audio, and photos easy and enjoyable. The programs in the collection can take on any multimedia-related task you have at hand:

  • Advanced video making app
  • Ultra-fast multimedia converter
  • High-quality screen recording tool
  • Handy media player
  • Video splitter
  • Optical disk burner
  • Utility for batch-uploading videos to various websites
  • Program for capturing video from we bcams, VHS, and TV-tuners

Full-featured video editor

Create your own video tutorials, game walkthroughs, and Let’s Plays:
  • Join and split video files
  • Add music or record your own narration
  • Apply filters and special effects
  • Insert titles, captions, and callouts
  • Export your footage directly to YouTube

High-quality screen recorder

This tool lets you record all kinds of desktop activity, including online videos, program use, and Skype calls.
  • Grab sound from multiple sources simultaneously
  • Capture keyboard and mouse activity
  • Record any screen area: program window, whole screen or any part of the screen
  • Take screenshots at any time

Super fast multimedia converter

With this utility, you can convert files between 180+ multimedia formats.
  • Change the format of video, audio, and images using SuperSpeed mode in a matter of seconds
  • Edit and enhance the quality of files before conversion
  • Prepare videos for viewing on mobile devices and sharing online

Plus

  • Split videos and cut out unwanted segments
  • Create slideshows in 3 easy steps
  • Play back videos and music in any format
  • Burn CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays; rip unencrypted DVDs
  • Capture video from webcams, VHS, and TV-tuners

data.short_description: Easily manage all your media files with this ultimate collection of Movavi’s top apps: join and edit videos, capture desktop activity, digitize videotapes, and convert files between 180+ different formats.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 830 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation
